transcript: the new military governor general of Petersburg, had received and read the then famous rescript of the Emperor Alexander from the army to Ser- ge'y Kuzmich, in which the Emperor said that he was receiving from all sides declarations of the people's loyalty, that the declaration from Petersburg gave him particular pleasure, and that he was proud to be at the head of such a nation and would endeavor to be worthy of it. This rescript began with the words: "Serge'y Kuzmich, From all sides re
